Le-co

Minimalistic-ish modular UI library

git repo

Configuration

For grids and other responsive patters you can specify set of breakpoints they will be generated against. 

$breakpoints: (
    "m": "481px",
    "l": "767px"
);

Example setting above will produce grid structure with classes like c-m-f1 that will kick in at 481px of width and c-l-f1 be effective at 767px and up.

There's configuration options in config.scss.

Layout

Container

Main .container can be used as generic "row" practically anywhere.

If combined with .container--fixed it will get centered and it will apply max-width specs based on breakpoint specification.

Text gutter for grid

I have reset the sensors to scan for frequencies outside the usual range. By emitting harmonic vibrations to shatter the lattices. We will monitor and adjust the frequency of the resonators.
By emitting harmonic vibrations to shatter the lattices. We will monitor and adjust the frequency of the resonators.
It may be due to the envelope over the structure, causing hydrogen-carbon helix patterns throughout. I'm comparing the molecular integrity of that bubble against our phasers.

Block grid

Block grids have breakpoint dependent overrides just like grids: 

.container > (ul/ol).bgrid-l-6.bgrid-m-3

Flex layouting

flex cell m3 > l2
flex cell m3 > l4
flex cell m3 > l4
flex cell
flex cell
flex cell

Typography

I have reset the sensors to scan for frequencies outside the usual range. By emitting harmonic vibrations to shatter the lattices. We will monitor and adjust the frequency of the resonators. He has this ability of instantly interpreting and extrapolating any verbal communication he hears. It may be due to the envelope over the structure, causing hydrogen-carbon helix patterns throughout. I'm comparing the molecular integrity of that bubble against our phasers.

Headings

Note: Heading below use p>strong. You should use heading tags.

.peta .heading

.tera .heading

.giga .heading

.mega .heading

.kilo .heading

.heading (default)

.micro .heading

.nano .heading

.piko .heading

Navigation

Navigation module:

.nav(.horizontal) > .nav--list > .nav--item > .nav--link

Media module (NOT FINISHED):

.media > .media--content

Helpers

Hiding element:

.hidden

Hiding text of the element:

.text-access

Float left:

.f-left

Float right:

.f-right

Ensuring image will keep proportions

.r-img

Horizontal spacing with padding ("p" prefix) or margins ("m"). "e" prefix for factor means EM, "r" prefix means using viewport units.

.p-top-1, .p-bottom-r1, .m-bottom-e1

Mixins

Common clearfix:

@mixin clearfix

Removing text from node:

@mixin text-access

Library is free for non-comercial and commercial use but cannot be re-sold as a standalone product.

author's github
